description: This file defines API endpoints for managing 'orders' in a food ordering backend. It includes routes to create an order, list current user's orders, and retrieve a specific order by ID, utilizing FastAPI and SQLAlchemy for database interactions.

methods.name: create_order( payload: CreateOrderRequest, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Creates a new order based on the cart items and user, validating restaurant and menu items, calculating total, and saving the order including its items.

methods.name: list_my_orders(session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Lists all orders for the current user, including their items.

methods.name: get_order(order_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific order by ID for the current user, including its items.

ctags.name: create_order
ctags.signature: ( payload: CreateOrderRequest, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_order
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_order(order_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = De/
ctags.signature: (order_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.pattern: /^async def list_my_orders(session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_/
